name: Smuggler's Run: Warzones
overview: Exotic Imports, an international delivery service, calls you back for another round of brutal courier action in Smuggler's Run: Warzones. This entry in the Smuggler's Run series lets you work for an elite band of smugglers. The game boasts a vehicle update--with the new hoverbike--plus new levels, new four-player multiplayer modes, and new countermeasures to thwart would-be pursuers and enemies. Now, make the drop, hit the nitro boost, and get across the border before all hell breaks loose.
